#WEB SCRAPING
```{r}
library("rvest")
library("dplyr")

link <- "https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Comma-separated_values"
#page <- read_html(link)
#class(page)
page <-link %>% read_html() %>% html_nodes(xpath = '//*[@id="mw-content-text"]/div[1]/table[2]/tbody') %>% html_table()
page
```
